concept.title: First File for Processing
concept.shortdesc: Configure a first file for processing when you want Directory to ignore certain files in the file directory.

conbody.p: When you start a pipeline, Directory starts processing with the file name that you enter and continues processing files in naturally ascending order. If you did not configure a file name, it starts with the file with the lowest file name.

For example, the file directory includes the following files: File.log, File1.log, File2.log, File3.log. If you configure File1.log as the first file, Directory begins processes File1.log and continues with File2.log and File3.log. It does not process File.log.
